name: Luumi Platinum Silicone Lid With Straw
description: Plastic lids may be convenient, but they're not great for our planet and its ocean life. This platinum silicone lid is flexible, durable and non-toxic, and has a sippy straw for enjoying your favourite smoothie.Food-grade silicone is easy to clean, won't transfer taste and is BPA-, BPS-, PVC- and phthalate-free.Dishwasher, microwave, oven and freezer safe.Lid is 8cm diameter, fitting 8-10cm diameter vessels.Straw bends to seal up the holes during travel. Pop one end out when it's time to drink.
